ostreliyawa ta erehiwa hobat hi pawathwena palamu test krikat tharagaye lakunu 393 ka jayagrahi ilakkayak hambaa yana shri lankawa eeye siwuwani dina tharagaya nathara karana wita kadulu 2 k dawi lakunu 65 k raskara gena sitiyeya.me anuwa jayagrahanaya sandaha thawath lakunu 328 ka awashyathawakata muhuna di sitina shri lankawa ee wenuwen kadulu 8k athathiwa ada tharagaye awasan dinaya ta muhuna deyi.eeye tharagaya nathara karana wita nayaka mahela jayawardhana lakunu 5 k da, kumar sangakkara lakunu 18 k da raskara gena nodawi krida karamin sitiyaha.me lakunu laba ganima sandaha sangakkara pandu 88katath, jayawardhana pandu 37katath muhuna dunha.jayawardhana ta lakunu laba ganima aarambha kirima sandaha pandu 25k gathawiya.palamu inime wishishta pithiharambaayaka niyalemin agana lakunu 147 k laba gath aarambhaka pithikaru thilakarathna dilshan ta eeye dewani inime di laba gatha hakiwuye lakunu 11k pamani.ohu 10 wani oowarayedi dawi giyeya.sangakkara eeye lakunu 3k laba gena sitiyadi dawi yamen berini.pita danga pandu yawana nethan liyon ge panduwakata sangakkara dun uda panduwa, padaye aabadhayak hethuwen apahasuwen ‘slip’ hi pandu rakimin siti klak ta athaharini.anek aarambhaka pithikaru dimuth karunarathna, michal stak ge ‘yokar’ panduwakin lakunu 30kata dawi giyeya.me anuwa 24 wani oowarayedi shri lanka dewani kadulla mulu lakunu 47 di binda watini.rangana herath daksha pandu yawima hamuwe ostreliyawa eeye dewani inime di lakunu 278 ka ta dawi giyeya.herath lakunu 96 ka ta kadulu 5k laba gath athara chanaka welagedara lakunu 89 ka ta kadulu 3 k laba gaththeya.siya wegawathma test ardha shathakaya wartha kirimen pasuwa ostreliyanu nayaka mayikal klak ta padaye aabadhayak hethuwen pitiyen iwathwa yamata siduwiya.ee wana wita ohu lakunu 57k raskara gena sitiyeya.ostreliyanu dewani inimedi owunge awasan kadulu 8 lakunu 146kata binda watini.eeta pera, aarambhaka pithikaruwan wana dewid wonar (68) ha ed kowan (56) lakunu 132k ras kalaha..

me dinawala aanduwa deshapalana hithawathkam matha labadena rakiya sandaha pa්rabala wirodhayak rata pura mathuwa atha.ithihasaye nowu wiru lesa aanduwa kisidu winiwidabhawayakin thorawa hithumathe nama lekhana sakasa me wanawita pathwim laba di atha.mulin sthira pathwim lesa labadun meki rakiya dan masa 6ka kalayakata pamanak labadun thawakalika bandawa ganim dakwa wenas wi atha.samastha upadhidharin me desa balasitinne meya da aanduwe thawath prodawak wannedayi sithamini.meki rakiya labadima pilibanda aanduwe pa්rakasha nisa me wanawita pathwima lada upadhidharin da apahasuthawayata pathwa atha.
